translations: 行动缓慢的（tardy 的比较级）

sentences.sentence: If all these upheavals were tardier than he hoped, it was because of the Mickey Mouse copyright laws.
sentences.translation: 这些巨变并没有如期而来，很大的原因是米老鼠版权法。

sentences.sentence: Compared to parents, F1 was tardier to the environments, and the changing range of flowering interval was smaller.
sentences.translation: F 1植株较其亲本，间隔期随果节位变化或季节推移变动较小，对环境变化较不敏感。
